source_objects.title: Web Development
source_objects.description: Learn web development skills to build fully functioning websites.

items.title: The Modern Angular Bootcamp
items.headline: Get job ready with Angular! Understand how to build, test, and deploy production-ready apps.
objectives_summary: Build amazing single page applications with Angular and Typescript
Master fundamental concepts behind structuring Angular applications
Realize the power of building composable components

items.title: The Complete ReactJs Course - Basics to Advanced (2021)
items.headline: Learn React JS from scratch with hands-on practice assignments and projects.
objectives_summary: Introduction to what is React and its basic concepts
Learn what is JSX and how it works behind the scenes
Learn what are the stateful and stateless components and when to use them

items.title: React and Typescript: Build a Portfolio Project
items.headline: Expand your portfolio of projects by building a complex app with the latest web technologies.
objectives_summary: Build a portfolio-ready project with React and Typescript
Integrate React and Redux together with Typescript
Simplify state updates with the fabulous Immer library

items.title: .NET 5 Web API & Entity Framework Crash Course
items.headline: Build your RESTful web service with .NET 5 Web API from the ground up and use Entity Framework to create your database.
objectives_summary: Build RESTful web services with .NET 5 Web API
Object-relational mapping with Entity Framework
Save data persistently in a SQL Server database

items.title: Asp.Net Core : The Complete Guide To Build RESTful Api's
items.headline: Learn to build secure RESTful Api's with Asp.Net Core, Entity Framework and C#
objectives_summary: Understand the Web Api's
Build the backend for your web and mobile apps
Build Web Api's with Entity Framework Code First Approach

items.title: Programming in Blazor - ASP.NET Core 5
items.headline: Create interactive web applications with C#
objectives_summary: Develop web applications using C# and Blazor
Use Azure DevOps to deploy Blazor apps
Create a Database using Entity Framework Core

items.title: 1 Hour HTML

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students
visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.name: John

items.headline: Learn how to code in HTML in 1 hour. This class is set up for complete beginners!
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of programming
Learn HTML
Give you a platform for furthur development

items.title: CSS - Basics To Advanced for front end development (2021)
items.headline: Complete guide to create beautiful, responsive and user-friendly websites using CSS3. Learn CSS3 with hands-on projects
objectives_summary: Basic styling of web pages using CSS3
Manipulate the display and position of HTML elements
Understand the Box Model concept

items.title: Wordpress Complete Web Design :Latest Wordpress Design Techs
items.headline: Master Wordpress website design with Elementor : beginner to Advanced - no coding & build Wordpress ecommerce web Design
objectives_summary: Know about the Wordpress & page builders.
Online Hosting, subdomains, choosing you domain name & Wordpress installation.
how to optimize images & create creative Art direction for web design with photoshop.

items.title: Microservices Architecture and Implementation on .NET 5
items.headline: Building Microservices on .Net which used Asp.Net Web API, Docker, RabbitMQ,Ocelot API Gateway, MongoDB,Redis,SqlServer
objectives_summary: ASPNET Core Web API Development of Microservices
REST API Principles, CRUD Operations
Mongo DB and Redis NoSQL Database Connection on Docker

items.title: Learn Bootstrap By Building Projects - Includes Bootstrap 4
items.headline: Master Responsive Web Development Using Bootstrap 3 and Bootstrap 4 While Building Real Life projects
objectives_summary: Build Responsive Websites
Understand the use of Bootstrap Components
Master the best practices for HTML, CSS and JS development

items.title: The Complete JavaScript Course For Web Development Beginners
items.headline: In this course students will learn the basics of JavaScript and beyond to help them in their web development needs
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of JavaScript
Learn basic syntax to write JavaScript code
Learn basic structure of JavaScript code

items.title: Angular 2+ with Typescript - Essential Training
items.headline: Learn Angular 2 (or 4) from the ground up | This course combines a Project, Slides and Quizzes | Perfect for beginners
objectives_summary: Understand the Fundamental Concepts of Angular 2
Develop Angular 2+ Applications using Best Practices
Learn and Use TypeScript

items.title: Complete PHP Course With Bootstrap3 CMS System & Admin Panel
items.headline: In this complete course students will learn how to use PHP with Bootstrap3 as well as A CMS System and Admin Panel
objectives_summary: You will be able to create beautiful Dynamic websites using HTML5, Bootstrap and PHP
You will be able to Create web Applications Like Admin Panel, Management softwares etc...
You will be able to Create thier Own CMS System with thier own Restriction, Style and theme. Other CMS Systems? No need.

items.title: Build a Blockchain & Cryptocurrency | Full-Stack Edition
items.headline: Full-stack blockchain programming course! A backend + frontend with Node.js, Jest, Express, React, Heroku, & more!
objectives_summary: Build a complete blockchain-powered cryptocurrency from scratch.
Understand and fluently converse on the core software engineering concepts behind blockchain and cryptocurrencies.
Create unique blockchain-centric solutions to real work problems and business applications.

items.title: Salesforce Developer Training with real-time project
items.headline: Salesforce Development: Learn apex, Visualforce and REST Webservices with this real-time project
objectives_summary: Integrate Salesforce application with external applications
Create there own custom application using APEX
Expose there apex methods as SOAP webservices
